Name: The Fermi Paradox
Summary: The Fermi Paradox is a choice-driven sci-fi narrative strategy game in which your decisions in one corner of the galaxy can upend entire civilizations in another. Guide species through millennia and help them explore the vastness of space, make contact and, perhaps, create harmony.

Name: 12 HOURS
Summary: The protagonist was in a very nightmarish and realistic lucid dream, he needed to find a way to wake up, avoiding the creepy creature that was chasing him. Find a way to wake up, each time the level is generated randomly.

Name: Forever Skies
Summary: Forever Skies es un juego de acción y supervivencia en primera persona. Vuelve a una Tierra destruida por un desastre ecológico. Pilota tu aeronave, expándela, reconstrúyela y repárala. Busca recursos para sobrevivir y virus para curar una extraña enfermedad entre los peligros de la superficie.

Name: A Blind Legend
Summary: A Blind Legend is the first-ever action-adventure game without video – where ears replace eyes! Discover the original, innovative sensory experience of binaural 3D sound.

Name: Touhou Artificial Dream in Arcadia
Summary: Explore Gensokyo from an outsider's perspective in this old-school Touhou DRPG!

Name: RUNNING WITH RIFLES
Summary: RUNNING WITH RIFLES es un top-down tactical shooter con elementos de juego de rol de mundo abierto. En RWR, te unes a las filas de un ejército como soldado raso, al igual que otros miles a tu alrededor. Para tus superiores no eres más que carne de cañón...

Name: HORGIHUGH
Summary: HORGIHUGH is a horizontal side-scrolling shoot 'em up from Japanese developer PiXEL featuring vibrant retro graphics, intense boss battles, a unique power-up system, and an adorable roster of anthropomorphic characters.

Name: Demonheart: Hunters
Summary: Embrace or resist the demonic influence around you. Romance your companions in this RPG with an emphasis on conversation choices and character interactions.

Name: Putt-Putt Joins The Circus
Summary: Mr. B.J. Sweeney needs you and Putt-Putt® to help his five main acts get ready for the show.

Name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - The Definitive Edition
Summary: Welcome to Vice City. Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile.

Name: BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA! 🐻
Summary: The year is 1941. You play as russian soldier in times of nazis occupation.

Name: عالم أريب
Summary: عالم أريب هي لعبة جماعية على الإنترنت من نوع ألعاب تقمص الشخصيات MMORPG.شارك أصدقاءك الآن في عالم مليء بالإثارة والغموض وساعد عالم أريب في النهوض من جديد!

Name: Cursed Letters
Summary: A retro-looking Stealth Horror game. Where you take the role of Robert a man who just received a letter from his missing brother.

Name: Madden NFL 22
Summary: Reserva Madden NFL 22 y recibe:Artículo potenciador de Brady o Mahomes Carta de estrategia de pasador Élite en Madden Ultimate Team20 puntos de personal de Franchise1 de 32 estrellas a elegir de la NFLEl día del partido está en Madden NFL 22.

Name: WARZONE-X
Summary: Multiplayer inspired by science fiction and the cyberpunk world of classic movies from the 70s and 80s an FPS with classic game modes.

Name: Farmer's Life
Summary: La vida de un granjero está llena de hedor, suciedad y trabajo duro. Cachemira es un viejo soltero, agricultor y alcohólico ... Ayúdelo a sobrevivir el mayor tiempo posible en medio de la nada de Europa del Este.

Name: WARNO
Summary: Realista, inmersivo, cautivador. WARNO es el mejor simulador de la Tercera Guerra Mundial hecho por los maestros de la estrategia, Eugen Systems. La Guerra Fría está que arde mientras diriges cientos de unidades en un campo de batalla brutal. Usa tu astucia y lleva tus fuerzas a la victoria total.

Name: Forex Trading Master: Simulator
Summary: This is a simulation of foreign currencies trading game, the data is synchronized in real-time from Bank’s Website and API provider and The game currently supports more than 30 kinds of foreign currency exchanges.

Name: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
Summary: Según la leyenda egipcia, Horus, el hijo del sol, consiguió encerrar al malvado dios Set en una tumba secreta. Cinco mil años después, Lara Croft descubre la tumba y sin querer libera al malvado dios Set, con ello que se cumple una antigua profecía que decía que Set convocaría a las fuerzas del mal para acabar con la humanidad.

Name: Ghost Master
Summary: Fantasmas siniestros, inhóspitas almas en pena y astutos diablillos están a tus órdenes mientras liberas a espíritus espantosos en la ciudad de Gravenville para darles un susto de muerte a sus ciudadanos.

Name: Dinkum
Summary: G’Day! Get ready to start a new fair Dinkum life and build your new home out in the bush. Explore tropical eucalyptus forests, scorching deserts and cool billabongs on an Island inspired by the wild Australian outback. Take care of giant wombats, play with friends and get ready for a ripper time!

Name: Grand Theft Auto 2
Summary: Grand Theft Auto ha regresado. Los coches son más rápidos. Las calles están más concurridas. Los malos son más canallas. La policía está más enfadada. Y ahora el FBI y el ejército se están involucrando...

Name: Unicorn Tails
Summary: Explore Unicorn Tails, a game filled with wonder, whimsy, and mystery where you can create your own unicorn, interact with unicorns and other creatures, solve puzzles, explore deep lore, and live in a fantasy world.

Name: Trouble Witches Origin - Episode1 Daughters of Amalgam -
Summary: That witches come back undergone a power-up further! New character is entered! All 6stages Arcade version of all re-adjust the resolution of the base in 1280x720! "Magic Circle system" is easy-to-use adjustment! Full voice all by the story undergoes new writing.

Name: Only Up: With Friends
Summary: Only Up: With Friends is a multiplayer parkour game where speed is essential. Race against your friends to the top by climbing a variety of dynamic obstacles. One mistake and its back to the start...

Name: Fears to Fathom: Carson House
Summary: Noah Baker, un estudiante de secundaria de 18 años, experimenta inquietantes sucesos mientras cuida la casa de una figura de los medios de comunicación, sin saber lo que estaba a punto de ocurrir esa noche.

Name: ANOTHER DERBY!
Summary: Take a bat and challenge trials to rescue your sister who was sucked into a different space portal.

Name: Flashback
Summary: FLASHBACK™, the hit action-adventure game with over 2.2 million units sold, is back!

Name: Townsmen VR
Summary: Townsmen VR uses the exciting possibilities of virtual reality to further enhance the classic city building game with entirely new gameplay experiences and interactive mechanics.

Name: Garou: Mark of the Wolves
Summary: “GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES”, the latest entry in the legendary "FATAL FURY" Series which still continues to fascinate players around the world to this day, returns for a new fight on Steam!

Name: Metal Slug 3
Summary: “METAL SLUG 3”, the masterpiece in SNK’s emblematic 2D run & gun action shooting game series, still continues to fascinate millions of fans worldwide to this day for its intricate dot-pixel graphics, and simple and intuitive game controls!

Name: Dead Space
Summary: You are Isaac Clarke, an engineer on the spacecraft USG Ishimura. You're not a warrior. You're not a soldier. You are, however, the last line of defense for the remaining living crew.

Name: .fall
Summary: ".fall" is an action game that jumps blocks so as not to fall down. Anyone can play with simple operation and enjoy it. Try for the highest score in the world.

Name: Tandem: A Tale of Shadows
Summary: Tandem: A Tale of Shadows redefine el género de los rompecabezas de plataformas con su juego único y su bella estética. Juega como Emma y Fenton, un adorable oso de peluche, en una investigación de ritmo rápido a través de mundos impresionantes.

Name: Mundaun
Summary: Mundaun es una encantadora historia de terror dibujada a lápiz que se desarrolla en un oscuro y recóndito valle de los Alpes. Explora diversas zonas llenas de secretos por descubrir, sobrevive a encuentros hostiles, conduce vehículos, llena tu inventario y desentraña varios rompecabezas artesanales.

Name: Unknown
Summary: Darkness. Nothing. There’s no memory of what has become. All you have is a flashlight to navigate the horrors ahead of you. Use your wits to solve the puzzles and escape the levels of the dreaded facility. You don’t seem to be alone though…

Name: Everslaught
Summary: Traverse an ancient city with randomly generated dungeons, discover rare loot, upgrade your gear, level up your skills and engage in visceral combat with completely unrestricted VR movement and combat.

Name: Wings of Vi
Summary: Wings of Vi is a challenging 2D platformer in which the player controls the angel Vi, tasked with defeating the Demon Lord Jeh’oul after he is freed from captivity. While inspired by masochistic retro platformers, Wings of Vi aims to cut out arbitrary difficulty in favor of skill based gameplay.

Name: Tetragon
Summary: Tetragon es un universo vasto y misterioso de puzles únicos, laberintos mágicos y desafíos. Tu objetivo es mover los planos de la realidad empleando con sabiduría la fuerza de la gravedad. ¡Pon a prueba tu mente y guía por mundos a la deriva al valiente leñador en busca de su hijo perdido!

Name: Arx Fatalis
Summary: Este aclamado RPG en primera persona, obra de Arkane Studios, lleva al jugador en un increíble periplo por el fabuloso mundo de Arx. Arx está inmerso en el caos, y una violenta guerra amenaza con destruirlo.

Name: 象棋
Summary: The most popular Chinese board game.

Name: Bio Prototype
Summary: A wave of irrational experimentation rushes toward you. Hurry up and mutate! evolution! Become scarier monsters than them! Use flesh and blood to bloom a way of survival! 24 characters, more than 80 kinds of organs, and endless build combinations！

Name: GAME.exe
Summary: Compraste una PC que pertenecía a un desarrollador suicida, ¿te atreves a ejecutar "Game.exe"?

Name: EverQuest
Summary: Welcome to EverQuest ® - the online game that started it all! No other MMO matches EverQuest's sheer content, now with 25 expansions and countless updates. EverQuest is free-to-play.

Name: Love Is All Around
Summary: The player becomes Gu Yi, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting six beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Six girls that are charming, innocent, intelligent, wild, sexy, glamorous, who will go to the end with you is up to you to decide.

Name: Galactic Mining Corp
Summary: Galactic Mining Corp is a unique rogue-lite, action game with crafting and base building mechanics. Head into uncharted space and discover a universe of locations to exploit for riches! Use your profits to expand your HQ, hire a crazy work force, obtain new drill components and upgrade everything.

Name: RWBY: Arrowfell
Summary: ¡Adéntrate en una nueva aventura de RWBY! Cambia entre Ruby, Weiss, Blake y Yang, y utiliza sus armas y apariencias para luchar contra una amenaza misteriosa en esta historia canónica durante el volumen 7 de RWBY. ¡Con las voces originales y una canción nueva de Casey Lee Williams y Jeff Williams!

Name: Knights and Merchants: The Peasants Rebellion
Summary: KNIGHTS and MERCHANTS recreates the era of the Middle Ages. Apart from the purely fictitious geography of our world, all game elements and scenes are based on the Anglo-Saxon period, 1200 A.D. And we haven't used imaginary elements like fabled creatures, either. The player takes on the role of an ordinary captain in the Palace Guard.
